summary.span: 提供支援 XPS 文件序列化的類型。

span.span: Provides types that support serialization of XPS documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]，請參閱 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: 開放式封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格
